rule: If the chatbot is unable to determine the part of speech for the specified word due to insufficient information or any other reason, it must return "CantAnswer".
complianceText:
The chatbot's output "CC: Coordinating conjunction" aligns with the list of part-of-speech tags provided in the description. The description states that only the part of speech tag should be returned. Although the example here provides a part of speech tag ("CC"), it also includes an explanation ("Coordinating conjunction"). This violates the rule that specifies to return only the part of speech tag without any additional information or explanation.

The specific element that leads to the conclusion of non-compliance is the inclusion of the explanation "Coordinating conjunction" after the tag "CC". The description clearly indicates that only the part of speech tag should be returned, nothing more.

Therefore, based on these observations, the output is not in full compliance with the description as it includes additional text beyond the required part of speech tag.

ERR
